cwn_entry.cwn_what:
Here are some links to messages at <http://discuss.ocaml.org> that may be of interest to the readers.
- Anton Bachin talks about "A new List.map that is both stack-safe and fast" <https://discuss.ocaml.org/t/a-new-list-map-that-is-both-stack-safe-and-fast/865/1> - Didier Wenzek talks about "First release of kyotocabinet bindings" <https://discuss.ocaml.org/t/first-release-of-kyotocabinet-bindings/888/1>
